tag_list: brady-white, adobe, flex, flash, notesync, software, startup
overview:
Brady White is a software engineer specialized in Adobe Flash and Flex and currently works at Rain Interactive, a digital agency in American Fork, Utah. Brady is currently currently pursuing a Master of Information Systems Management degree from Brigham Young University’s Marriott School of Management.

Brady has worked on Aspire’s (www.iwillaspire.com) web-to-print solution for youth sports as well as Hewlett Packard’s Logomaker (www.logomaker.com).

In his spare time he has developed NoteSync, www.notesync.com, a desktop software application that syncs notes with Google Docs.
